tool_description: Generate interesting random facts to show your audience from a wide collection of facts.
name: Amazing Facts
title: Amazing Facts

api_list.name: Get random facts from over 100 categories
api_list.description: This endpoint will return 5 random facts from over 100 categories
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://amazing-facts.p.rapidapi.com/facts"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "amazing-facts.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://amazing-facts.p.rapidapi.com/facts"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "amazing-facts.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
